lead_paragraph: Oil prices were rising after the government reported a larger-than-expected drop in fuel stockpiles last week.

headline.print_headline: Wall Street Pauses After 2 Days of Notable Gains
headline.main: Wall St. Pauses After 2 Days of Gains

snippet: Oil prices were rising after the government reported a larger-than-expected drop in fuel stockpiles last week.
abstract: Stocks are flat following two days of big gains, with investors evincing caution.
